::DrillBit::

DrillBit looked at Psuedo.
"Kit doesn't even know she ever new a Land Mine or a Time Bomb. The only
thing I could do too cure her insanity was to either erase the memorys
of Land Mine and Time Bomb, or compleatly reprogram her. I erased the
memorys."
